General_Description: '''Blue Tears on the Sea''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Athens|Athenian]] [[penteconter]]s must be dealt with if [[Sparta]] hopes to make gains by sea."
Section_Outcome: Kassandra sought out and sank a number of Athenian small [[ship]]s throughout [[Greece]], gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[Better on Foot, but Dangerous on the Sea]] and [[The Spartan Payback]].
